name: local-link
description: LocalLink is a cutting-edge, secure, and user-friendly tool designed for seamless file transfer and real-time messaging within a Local Area Network (LAN). Developed using Node.js for a robust backend and Vue 3 for a responsive frontend, this application is tailored for environments requiring rapid, secure, and efficient communication and file sharing, such as small businesses, educational institutions, or home networks.
author: Andrew Xiaomai
